CREATE TABLE `donations` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `device_id` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `status` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `created_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `updated_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
CREATE TABLE `books` ( `donation_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `ISBN` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `status` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, KEY `FK_DONATION_ID` (`donation_id`), CONSTRAINT `FK_DONATION_ID` FOREIGN KEY (`donation_id`) REFERENCES `donations` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
